  background-attachment: scroll !important;
  background-color: transparent !important;
  background-image: none !important;
  /* This rule affects the use of pngfix JavaScript http://dillerdesign.com/experiment/DD_BelatedPNG for IE6, which is used to force the browser to recognise alpha-transparent PNGs files that replace the IE6 lack of PNG transparency. (The rule overrides the VML image that is used to replace the given CSS background-image). If you don't know what that means, then you probably haven't used the pngfix script, and this comment may be ignored :) */
  background-position: 0 0 !important;
  background-repeat: repeat !important;
  border-color: black !important;
  border-color: currentColor !important;
  /* `border-color` should match font color. Modern browsers (incl. IE9) allow the use of "currentColor" to match the current font 'color' value <http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#currentcolor>. For older browsers, a default of 'black' is given before this rule. Guideline to support older browsers: if you haven't already declared a border-color for an element, be sure to do so, e.g. when you first declare the border-width. */
  border-style: none !important;
  border-width: medium !important;
  bottom: auto !important;
  clear: none !important;
  clip: auto !important;

    setTimeout(()=>{
      var aTags = document.querySelectorAll(".jsx-3234738241.label-description");

var htmlImaSVG = `Escanea el QR  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="20" viewBox="0 0 39 39"><path fill="#00E676" d="M10.7 32.8l.6.3c2.5 1.5 5.3 2.2 8.1 2.2 8.8 0 16-7.2 16-16 0-4.2-1.7-8.3-4.7-11.3s-7-4.7-11.3-4.7c-8.8 0-16 7.2-15.9 16.1 0 3 .9 5.9 2.4 8.4l.4.6-1.6 5.9 6-1.5z"></path><path fill="#FFF" d="M32.4 6.4C29 2.9 24.3 1 19.5 1 9.3 1 1.1 9.3 1.2 19.4c0 3.2.9 6.3 2.4 9.1L1 38l9.7-2.5c2.7 1.5 5.7 2.2 8.7 2.2 10.1 0 18.3-8.3 18.3-18.4 0-4.9-1.9-9.5-5.3-12.9zM19.5 34.6c-2.7 0-5.4-.7-7.7-2.1l-.6-.3-5.8 1.5L6.9 28l-.4-.6c-4.4-7.1-2.3-16.5 4.9-20.9s16.5-2.3 20.9 4.9 2.3 16.5-4.9 20.9c-2.3 1.5-5.1 2.3-7.9 2.3zm8.8-11.1l-1.1-.5s-1.6-.7-2.6-1.2c-.1 0-.2-.1-.3-.1-.3 0-.5.1-.7.2 0 0-.1.1-1.5 1.7-.1.2-.3.3-.5.3h-.1c-.1 0-.3-.1-.4-.2l-.5-.2c-1.1-.5-2.1-1.1-2.9-1.9-.2-.2-.5-.4-.7-.6-.7-.7-1.4-1.5-1.9-2.4l-.1-.2c-.1-.1-.1-.2-.2-.4 0-.2 0-.4.1-.5 0 0 .4-.5.7-.8.2-.2.3-.5.5-.7.2-.3.3-.7.2-1-.1-.5-1.3-3.2-1.6-3.8-.2-.3-.4-.4-.7-.5h-1.1c-.2 0-.4.1-.6.1l-.1.1c-.2.1-.4.3-.6.4-.2.2-.3.4-.5.6-.7.9-1.1 2-1.1 3.1 0 .8.2 1.6.5 2.3l.1.3c.9 1.9 2.1 3.6 3.7 5.1l.4.4c.3.3.6.5.8.8 2.1 1.8 4.5 3.1 7.2 3.8.3.1.7.1 1 .2h1c.5 0 1.1-.2 1.5-.4.3-.2.5-.2.7-.4l.2-.2c.2-.2.4-.3.6-.5s.4-.4.5-.6c.2-.4.3-.9.4-1.4v-.7s-.1-.1-.3-.2z"></path></svg>
`

var searchText = "Escanea el QR";
var found;

for (var i = 0; i < aTags.length; i++) {
  if (aTags[i].textContent == searchText) {
    aTags[i].innerHTML = htmlImaSVG;
    found = aTags[i];
    break;
  }
}
    }, 800)
  });


}
</script>

class="SEOBlock-module_block-content__Yk7EQ"><p>Ya viene <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/black-friday-ofertas?staticPageId=33400003">Black Friday</a>; el evento de descuentos y ofertas más esperado del año a nivel mundial, sabemos cuánta expectativa genera este evento y por eso en Falabella queremos sorprenderte con promociones imperdibles para que puedas adelantar tus y muchas otras más. Prepárate para disfrutar del mejor <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/black-friday-ofertas?staticPageId=33400003">Black Friday</a> en Falabella, desde este 25 hasta el 27 de noviembre de 2022.</p></div></div><div class="seo-block col-12 col-md-3 SEOBlock-module_seo-block__mR7Lo" aria-label="block-content"><span class="SEOBlock-module_block-title__a4KW5">Unas vacaciones muy esperadas</span><div class="SEOBlock-module_block-content__Yk7EQ"><p>Prepárate para disfrutar de unas merecidas <a necesitas para disfrutar de un descanso tan esperado, podrás encontrar desde lo más básico para disfrutar del sol y la playa como lo son <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/collection/proteccion-solar">protectores solares</a>, <a tantos días decidas tomarte para descansar lo que necesitarás para cualquier viaje que decidas hacer es una maleta de viaje que se adapte a tus planes, en Falabella podrás encontrar una amplia variedad de opciones de las mejores marcas como <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat10650948/Maletas-de-Viaje?facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.brandName=explora">Explora</a> y muchas otras más; incluso podrás encontrar <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat10650948/Maletas-de-Viaje?&amp;facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.attribute.Tipo=Bolsa+multiprop%C3%B3sito%3A%3ABolsa+m%C3%BAltiproposito%3A%3ACartucheras%3A%3AKit+de+viaje%3A%3AOrganizador">accesorios para organizar tu maleta</a> de una manera impecable.</p></div></div><div class="seo-block col-12 col-md-3 SEOBlock-module_seo-block__mR7Lo SEOBlock-module_translucent-block__qy8-T" aria-label="block-content"><span class="SEOBlock-module_block-title__a4KW5">Hinchas del Fútbol</span><div class="SEOBlock-module_block-content__Yk7EQ"><p>Llega la fiesta deportiva más importante y sabemos que eres un fánatico de ver los goles y jugadas más increíbles en el evento que reúne a las mejores selecciones de fútbol del mundo, por eso en Falabella podrás encontrar todo lo que necesitas para hacer de tu hogar el mejor estadio para disfrutar del torneo de fútbol más importante, desde <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat1360963/TV">televisores</a> de las mejores marcas como <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat1360963/TV?facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.brandName=samsung">Samsung</a>, <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat1360963/TV?facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.brandName=lg">LG</a>, <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat1360963/TV?facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.attribute.Tama%C3%B1o_de_la_pantalla=65+pulgadas%3A%3A70+pulgadas%3A%3A75+pulgadas%3A%3A77+pulgadas%3A%3A82+pulgadas">65 pulgadas</a>, <a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/category/cat1360963/TV?facetSelected=true&amp;f.product.attribute.Tama%C3%B1o_de_la_pantalla=55+pulgadas%3A%3A58+pulgadas%3A%3A60+pulgadas">55 pulgadas</a>; una gran pantalla demanda un excelente sonido por eso también te ofrecemos las mejores opciones en <a SEOBlock-module_seo-block__mR7Lo SEOBlock-module_translucent-block__qy8-T" aria-label="block-content"><span class="SEOBlock-module_block-title__a4KW5">Comuna 13 x Falabella</span><div class="SEOBlock-module_block-content__Yk7EQ"><p>Descubre una nueva colaboración de moda inspirada en el streetwear, el arte urbano, los colores y la alegría que caracteriza a <a creatividad, la pasión y la alegría que caracteriza a todos los habitantes de uno de los tantos bellos lugares de nuestro país. Si amas el streetwear acá encontrarás hoodies, camisetas, joggers y muchas prendas más que te inspirarán a encontrar un nuevo e increíble look.</p></div></div></div><div style="background:#f6f6f6" /**
 * eVar88, eVar 88
 * Home Tag
 * EXP-53
 * 
 */

function checkIfTesting() {
    return /hometagtest=true/i.test(document.URL) || _satellite.cookie.get('hometagtest');
}
if (checkIfTesting()) {
    if (document.querySelector('.site-wrapper')) {
        document.querySelector('.site-wrapper').style.background = "green";
    }

    document.body.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
    });

}

function addHomeTagHandlers() {
    document.addEventListener('mousedown', function(event) {
        var target = event.target;
        var elementModuleWrapper = target.closest("[data-wrapper]");
        if (elementModuleWrapper) {
            var suffix = flexibleTagging(elementModuleWrapper, target, event);
            if (suffix) {
                if (checkIfTesting()) {
                    alert(suffix);
                } else {
                    localStorage.setItem('hometag', JSON.stringify(suffix));
                }
            }
        }
    })
}

function flexibleTagging(parent, clickedElement, event) {
    var elementCTA = clickedElement.closest('[data-cta]');
    var list = elementArray('[data-cta]', parent);
    if (elementCTA && parent && list.length > 0) {
        var parentDataRef = parent.dataset.wrapper.match(/(.*)-(.*)/);
        var parentIdentifier = parentDataRef ? parentDataRef[1] : "undefined";
        var parentSectionName = parentDataRef ? parentDataRef[2] : "undefined";
        var parentPositionIndex = elementArray('[data-wrapper]').indexOf(parent) + 3;
        var containterCTA = elementCTA.closest('[data-cont]');
        var elementOrderNumber;
        var ctaOrderNumber;
        var nodeCheckImage;
        if (containterCTA) {
            elementOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cont]', parent).length > 0 ? elementArray('[data-cont]', parent).indexOf(containterCTA) + 1 : 1;
            ctaOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cta]', containterCTA).indexOf(elementCTA) + 1;
            nodeCheckImage = containterCTA;
        } else {
            elementOrderNumber = elementArray('[data-cta]', parent).indexOf(elementCTA) + 1;
            ctaOrderNumber = 1;
            nodeCheckImage = elementCTA;
        }

        var imageSource = giveImageSrc(nodeCheckImage) ? giveImageSrc(nodeCheckImage) : giveImageSrc(parent);

        return {
            dataWrapper: parentIdentifier,
            dataWrapperSub: parentSectionName,
            positionInPage: parentPositionIndex,
            positionInSection: elementOrderNumber,
            imgSource: imageSource,
            pixelY: event.pageY
        };
    }
    return false;
}

function giveImageSrc(node) {
    var nodeImageSrc = findImage(node);
    if (nodeImageSrc) {
        return nodeImageSrc;
    }
    var nodeContainer = node.closest('[data-cont]') && node.closest('[data-cont]').parentNode || node.closest('[data-wrapper]');
    if (nodeContainer) {
        var nodeContainerImageSrc = findImage(nodeContainer);
        if (nodeContainerImageSrc) {
            return findImage(nodeContainer);
        }
    }

    return "N/A";
}

function findImage(node2) {

    var pictureQuerySelector = node2.querySelector('source') || node2.closest('source') || node2.querySelector('img') || node2.closest('img');

    if (pictureQuerySelector && pictureQuerySelector.srcset) {
        return pictureQuerySelector.srcset.replace(/\s/gi, '').split(',')[0].replace(/\.webp\d+\w+/, ".webp").replace(/\?.*/, '');
    } else if (pictureQuerySelector && pictureQuerySelector.src) {
        return pictureQuerySelector.src.replace(/\s/gi, '').split(',')[0].replace(/\.webp\d+\w+/, ".webp").replace(/\?.*/, '');
    }
}

//Utility functions
function elementArray(selector, parent) {
    return [].slice.apply((parent || document).querySelectorAll(selector));
}

addHomeTagHandlers();


/**
 * eVar88 Search bar
 */

var searchInput = document.querySelector('#testId-SearchBar-Input');
var searchButton = document.querySelector('[class*="SearchBar-module_searchBtnIcon"]');

function handleSearchEvent() {
    localStorage.setItem('hometag', 'S|x|x|x|x|x|x|x');
}

searchButton.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    handleSearchEvent();
});

searchInput.addEventListener('change', function(e) {
    handleSearchEvent();
});

/**
 * 
 * ShadowRoot
 */

var shadowInterval = setInterval(getShadowRoots, 1500);
var shadowIntent = 0;
var shadowLimit = 5;

function getShadowRoots() {
    var shadowRoots = [];

    document.querySelectorAll('*').forEach(function(e) {
        if (e.shadowRoot) {
            shadowRoots.push({
                shadowRoot: e.shadowRoot,
                parent: e
            });
        }
    });

    if (shadowLimit < shadowIntent) {
        clearInterval(shadowInterval);
    }

    if (shadowRoots.length > 0) {

        clearInterval(shadowInterval);
        handleShadowRoots(shadowRoots);
    }

    shadowIntent++;

}

function handleShadowRoots(shadowRoots) {

    shadowRoots.forEach(function(e) {
        e.shadowRoot.addEventListener('mousedown', function(event) {
            var tagging = flexibleTagging(event.target.closest('[data-wrapper]'), event.target, event);
            localStorage.setItem('hometag', JSON.stringify(tagging));
        });
    });

}

/* 
    START OF CROSSOVER
    Campaing?
*/
function CyberMundosStructure(parent, clickedElement) {
    var mundo = clickedElement.closest('[class*="world__1nii4"]');
    try {
        var list = elementArray('.World_world__1nii4', mundo.closest(parent.selector));
    } catch (err) {}

    if (mundo) {
        var mundoTitle = mundo.querySelector('[class*="worldTitle__Kd3VQ"]').textContent.trim();
        var mundoOrderNumber = list.indexOf(mundo) + 1;
        var clickedPod = clickedElement.closest('[class*="podAnchor"]');
        var clickedPromoPod = clickedElement.closest('[class*="podPromoContainer"]');
        var clickedAll = clickedElement.closest('[class*="showMoreDesktopOption"]');
        var clickedAllMobile = clickedElement.closest('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]');
        var clickedStopper = clickedElement.closest('[class*="WorldStopper_fbStopper"]');

        if (clickedPod) {
            var podOrder = elementArray('a', mundo).indexOf(clickedPod) + 1 - elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).length;
            var podDetail = clickedPod.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];

            var podImg = clickedPod.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|PC" + podOrder + "|" + podOrder + "|" + podDetail + "|" + podImg;

        }
        if (clickedPromoPod) {
            var podOrder = elementArray('a', mundo).indexOf(clickedPromoPod) + 1 - elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).length;
            var podDetail = clickedPromoPod.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/) || undefined;
            if (podDetail) {
                podDetail = podDetail[1]
            }
            var podImg = clickedPromoPod.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];

            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|PC" + podOrder + "|" + podOrder + "|" + podDetail + "|" + podImg.replace('?', '');

        }

        if (clickedAll) {
            var allText = clickedAll.querySelector("span").innerText;
            var allOrder = elementArray('[class*="showMoreDesktopOption"]', mundo).indexOf(clickedAll) + 1;
            var allDetail = clickedAll.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Ver todo - " + allText + "|" + allOrder + "|" + allDetail + '|.';

        }

        if (clickedAllMobile) {
            var allMobileText = clickedAllMobile.querySelector("span").innerText;
            var allMobileOrder = elementArray('[class*="showmoreDropdownOption"]', mundo).indexOf(clickedAllMobile) + 1;
            var allMobileDetail = clickedAllMobile.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Ver todo - " + allMobileText + "|" + allMobileOrder + "|" + allMobileDetail + '|.';

        }

        if (clickedStopper) {
            var stopperDetail = clickedStopper.querySelector('a').href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];

            var stopperImg = clickedStopper.querySelector('img').src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0];
            return mundoTitle + "|" + mundoOrderNumber + "|Stopper " + 1 + "|" + 1 + "|" + stopperDetail + "|" + stopperImg;

        }
    }
}

function HotProduct(parent, clickedElement) {
    var hotProductItem = clickedElement.closest('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselItemInner"]');
    var hotProductContainer = clickedElement.closest('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselStrip"]');
    if (hotProductContainer && hotProductItem) {
        //var hotProductDetail = hotProductItem.querySelector('a').href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
        var hotProductDetail = hotProductItem.parentElement.href.match(/(cat\d+|staticPageId=.*|Ntt=.*|\d+)/)[1];
        var hotProductPos = elementArray('[class*="carouselStyles_carouselItemInner"]', hotProductContainer).indexOf(hotProductItem) + 1;
        var clickedElementImage = hotProductItem.querySelector("img").src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg|([^\/]+)\.svg/)[0]
        return "Lo mas Hot|1|" + hotProductDetail + "|" + hotProductPos + "|" + clickedElementImage.replace('?', '') + '|.';
    }
}

function secondLevelHandler(firstLevel, clickedElement) {
    switch (firstLevel.identifier) {
        //caselist
        //H,V, BXL, DD, PCE, M, BP, RECs, SAF,Footer
        case 'LMH':
            return HotProduct(firstLevel, clickedElement);
            break;
        case 'M':
            return CyberMundosStructure(firstLevel, clickedElement);
            break;
        default:
            break;
    }
}

function addCyberTagHandlers() {
    //S,V, BXL, DD, M, BP, RECs, SAF
    var firstLevelList = [{
        identifier: 'M',
        selector: '#fbra_browseHomeEventModule',
        prefix: 'M|'
    }, {
        identifier: 'LMH',
        selector: '#carrusel-dy',
        prefix: 'LMH|'

    }]
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {

        var target = event.target;
        var validTopmostParent = firstLevelList.filter(function(firstLevel) {
            var possibleParent = firstLevel.selector && target.closest(firstLevel.selector);
            return possibleParent;
        })
        if (validTopmostParent.length > 0) {

            var elementModuleWrapper = target.closest(".fb-module-wrapper.fb-m-b");

            var suffix = secondLevelHandler(validTopmostParent[0], target);
            if (suffix) {
                if (elementModuleWrapper || suffix.match(/multicampanas/i) || suffix.match(/banners/i)) {
                    var elementPositionIndex = elementArray('.fb-module-wrapper', document.querySelector('.page-wrapper')).indexOf(elementModuleWrapper) + 4;
                    //localStorage.setItem('cyberString', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + elementPositionIndex + '|' + suffix));
                    localStorage.setItem('hometag', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + elementPositionIndex + '|' + suffix));
                } else {
                    //localStorage.setItem('cyberString', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + suffix));
                    localStorage.setItem('hometag', (validTopmostParent[0].prefix + suffix));
                }
            }
        }
    })
}
/* 
    /.END OF START OF CROSSOVER
*/
addCyberTagHandlers();

</style><script>_satellite["_runScript2"](function(event, target, Promise) {
document.addEventListener('mouseover', function(e) {
    var optionPointer = e.target.querySelector('.pointer');
    if (optionPointer) {
        if (!document.querySelector('.shopping-guide-cont') && document.querySelector('.secondLevelMenuContainer-item')) {
            var guiasDesktop = document.createElement('div');
            guiasDesktop.classList.add('shopping-guide-cont', 'hide');
            document.querySelector('.secondLevelMenuContainer-item').appendChild(guiasDesktop);
        }
        var shoppingCont = document.querySelector('.shopping-guide-cont');
        if (/Electro/i.test(optionPointer.parentElement.textContent)) {
            shoppingCont.classList.remove('hide');
            shoppingCont.classList.remove('small-guide-cont');
          //<a class="shgui-over2" href="https://www.falabella.com/falabella-cl/page/guia-de-compra-aspiradora-robot?staticPageId=42900001&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-aspiradora-icon"></i> ¿Cómo elegir tu <strong>aspiradora robot</strong>?</a>
            shoppingCont.innerHTML = '<a class="shgui-over2" href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-lavadora?staticPageId=21700013&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-laundry-icon"></i> ¿Cómo elegir tu <strong>lavadora</strong>?</a><a class="shgui-over2" href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-una-nevera?staticPageId=21900001&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-refri-icon"></i> ¿Cómo elegir tu <strong>nevecón</strong>?</a>'
        } else if (/Muebles/i.test(optionPointer.parentElement.textContent)) {
            shoppingCont.classList.remove('hide');
            shoppingCont.classList.remove('small-guide-cont');
            shoppingCont.innerHTML = '<a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-un-sofa?staticPageId=21700012&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-sofa-icon"></i> ¿Cómo elegir tu <strong>sofá</strong>?</a>';
        } else if (/Deportes/i.test(optionPointer.parentElement.textContent)) {
            shoppingCont.classList.remove('hide');

function createLiGuiasMobile() {

    var guiasMobileOption = document.createElement('li');
    guiasMobileOption.classList.add('shopping-guide-cont');
    return guiasMobileOption;
}
function insertGuiasMobile(){

    if (document.querySelector('.secondLevelMenu__mobile') && !document.querySelector('li.shopping-guide-cont')) {

    document.querySelectorAll('.firstLevelMenu__title').forEach(function(el) {
        if (/deportes/i.test(el.innerText) && el.parentNode.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__content,.sr-only')) {
            var deportesOption = createLiGuiasMobile();
            deportesOption.innerHTML = '<a class="shgui-2lines" href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-una-bicicleta?staticPageId=22400001&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-bike-icon"></i> <p>¿Cómo elegir tu bicicleta?</p></a>'
            var deportesOption2 = createLiGuiasMobile();
            deportesOption2.innerHTML = '<a class="shgui-2lines" href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Maquinas-para-hacer-ejercicio?staticPageId=21700010?mkid=PL_H_VER_1000002484&staticPageId=2000020&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-exercises-machine-icon"></i><p>¿Cómo elegir tus máquinas de ejercicio?</p></a>';
            var deportesOption3 = createLiGuiasMobile();
            deportesOption3.innerHTML = '<a class="shgui-2lines" href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-un-scooter?staticPageId=22400004&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-scooter-icon"></i> <p>¿Cómo elegir tu scooter eléctrico?</p></a>'
            el.parentNode.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__content,.sr-only').appendChild(deportesOption);
            el.parentNode.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__content,.sr-only').appendChild(deportesOption2);
            el.parentNode.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__content,.sr-only').appendChild(deportesOption3);
        }
        if (/muebles/i.test(el.innerText) && el.parentNode.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__content,.sr-only')) {

            mueblesOption.innerHTML = '<a href="https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/page/Como-comprar-un-sofa?staticPageId=21700012&uxref=guiataxo"><i class="shgui-sofa-icon"></i> <p>¿Cómo elegir tu sofá?</p></a>';

var tools = {
  api: {
    rgx: function rgx(str) {
      var regex = new RegExp(str);
      return regex;
    }
  },
  elements: {
    checkForElement: function checkForElement(element, callback) {
      var el = element;
      var interval = setInterval(function (e) {
        var theElement = document.getElementById(el) || document.querySelectorAll(el);
        if (theElement.length === 0 || theElement === null) return;
        callback();
        clearInterval(interval);
      }, 400);
    },
    transformToArray: function transformToArray(el) {
      el = [].slice.apply(el);
      return el;
    },
    onBody: function onBody(bool, str) {
      if (bool) {
        document.body.classList.add(str);
      } else {
        document.body.classList.remove(str);
      }
    },
    createContainer: function createContainer(htmltag, strclass) {
      var innerInfo = arguments.length > 2 && arguments[2] !== undefined ? arguments[2] : '';
      var a = document.createElement(htmltag);
      a.className = strclass;
      a.innerHTML = innerInfo;
      return a;
    }
  },
  url: {
    checkUrlParams: function checkUrlParams(url, param) {
      var urlAccepted;
      var params = param;

      if (url.includes(params)) {
        urlAccepted = true;
      }

      return urlAccepted;
    }
  },
  network: {
    intercepter: function intercepter(callback) {
      var oldXHROpen = window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open;

      window.XMLHttpRequest.prototype.open = function (method, url, async, user, password) {
        // do something with the method, url and etc.
        this.addEventListener('load', function (e) {
          //console.log('load: ' + this.responseURL);
          var thisResponse = this.response === '' || this.reponse === undefined ? this.response : JSON.parse(this.response);
          callback(this.readyState, this.responseURL, thisResponse);
        });
        return oldXHROpen.apply(this, arguments);
      };
    },
    validateIntercep: function validateIntercep(state, element, url) {
      var pageValid = false;

      try {
        if (state !== 4) return;
        var checkHttpRequest = tools.api.rgx('confirm-your-order').test(url);
        if (!checkHttpRequest) return;
        var deliverySummary = document.getElementById(element);
        if (!deliverySummary.length) return;
        pageValid = true;
      } catch (e) {
        console.log('problem in validatePage(fn)/delivery -', e);
      }

      return pageValid;
    }
  },
  validate: {
    checkForMobile: function checkForMobile() {
      var windoWidth = window.innerWidth;
      var itsOkay;
      if (windoWidth < 521) itsOkay = true;
      return itsOkay;
    }
  },
  str: {
    removeSpecial: function removeSpecial(str) {
      return str.normalize('NFD').replace(/[^\w\s]/gi, '');
    }
  }
};

    newSpan.className = theclass; //'sale_ticket';

    newSpan.innerText = thetext; //'NUEVO';

    return newSpan;
  }
};
var ui = {
  addSaleSpan: function addSaleSpan(selectoToArr, parent) {
    var arrX = [].slice.apply(selectoToArr.querySelectorAll('[class*="_listElements"]'));
    var firstArrX = arrX[0];
    var beforeLastArrX = arrX[arrX.length - 2];
    arrX.forEach(function (el, index) {
      var innerHref = el.querySelector('[class*="submenuElementLi"]');

      if (/nuevo/.test(innerHref.textContent.toLowerCase()) && firstArrX.textContent === innerHref.textContent) {
        if (innerHref.textContent.length >= 22) return; // el.setAttribute('href', 'https://www.falabella.com/falabella-cl/page/Navidad-Decoracion?staticPageId=39400001');
        //el.innerText = el.innerText.replace(/SALE/g,'').trim();
        //if(parent.querySelector('.sale_ticket.new')) return;

        if (parent.querySelector('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuTitle"]').closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuElements"]').querySelector('.sale_ticket.new')) return;
        innerHref.innerText = innerHref.innerText.replace('NUEVO', '').trim();
        if (innerHref.querySelector('.sale_ticket')) return;
        innerHref.appendChild(template.label('sale_ticket new', 'NUEVO'));
      }

      if (/sale/.test(innerHref.textContent.toLowerCase()) && beforeLastArrX.textContent === innerHref.textContent) {
        if (innerHref.textContent.length >= 22) return; // el.setAttribute('href', 'https://www.falabella.com/falabella-cl/page/Navidad-Decoracion?staticPageId=39400001');
        //el.innerText = el.innerText.replace(/SALE/g,'').trim();
        //if(parent.querySelector('.sale_ticket.new')) return;

        if (parent.querySelector('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuTitle"]').closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuElements"]').querySelector('.sale_ticket.sale')) return;
        innerHref.innerText = innerHref.innerText.replace('SALE', '').trim();
        if (innerHref.querySelector('.sale_ticket.sale')) return;
        innerHref.appendChild(template.label('sale_ticket sale', 'SALE'));
      }
    });
  },
  findNodesToInsert: function findNodesToInsert() {
    var secondLevelItems = document.querySelectorAll('section[class*="Menu-module_menuSection"] [class*="SecondLevelItems_"] ul[class*="_detailsElements"]');
    if (!secondLevelItems.length) return;
    var arrSecondlevelItems = [].slice.apply(secondLevelItems); // find each case

      var arrSecontParent = el; //if(el.querySelector('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuTitle"]')){

      if (el.querySelector('[class*="ThirdLevelItems_listElements"]')) {
        //if(el.querySelector('.sale_ticket.new'))return;

        ui.addSaleSpan(x, arrSecontParent); //}
      }
    });
  }
};

var tool = {
    seekAndDestroy: function(){
        var seekConstantly = setInterval(function(){
            var firstLevelMenu = document.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__desktop');
            if(firstLevelMenu){
                var a = firstLevelMenu.querySelectorAll('li[class*="jsx-"]');
                var applySliceElement = [].slice.apply(a);
                applySliceElement.find(function(el){
                    if(/active/.test(el.className)){ // && /deco/.test(el.textContent.toLowerCase())
                        ui.findNodesToInsert();      
                    }
                })
            }
            // clearInterval(seekConstantly);
        }, 400);
    }
};
var ui = {
    findNodesToInsert: function() {
        var secondLevelItems = document.querySelectorAll('.secondLevelMenu');
        if(!secondLevelItems.length) return;
        var arrSecondlevelItems = [].slice.apply(secondLevelItems);
        // find each case
        arrSecondlevelItems.map(function(el){
            var arrSecontParent = el;
            //if(el.querySelector('.sale_ticket')) return;
            var thirdMenu = el.querySelectorAll('a[class*="thirdLevelMenu"]');
            var arrThirdMenu = [].slice.apply(thirdMenu);
            var firstArrX = arrThirdMenu[0];
            var lastArrX = arrThirdMenu[arrThirdMenu.length -2]
            if(arrThirdMenu.length){
                arrThirdMenu.map(function(el){
                    var text = el.textContent.normalize('NFD').replace(/[^\w\s]/gi, '').toLowerCase();
                    if (/nuevo/.test(text) && firstArrX.textContent === el.textContent) {
                        if(text.length >= 22) return;
                        ui.addSaleSpan(el, arrSecontParent,'sale_ticket new','NUEVO', true);
                        // thirdMenu.setAttribute('href', 'https://www.falabella.com/falabella-cl/page/Navidad-Decoracion?staticPageId=39400001');
                    }
                    if (/sale/.test(text) && lastArrX.textContent === el.textContent) {
                        if(text.length >= 22) return;
                        ui.addSaleSpan(el, arrSecontParent,'sale_ticket sale','SALE', false);
                        // thirdMenu.setAttribute('href', 'https://www.falabella.com/falabella-cl/page/Navidad-Decoracion?staticPageId=39400001');
                    } 
                });
            }
        });
    },
    addSaleSpan: function(el,parent, thisClass, thisTxt, bool){
        //var newSpan = document.createElement('span');
        //newSpan.className = 'sale_ticket new';
        //newSpan.innerText = 'NUEVO';
        //el.innerText = el.innerText.replace(/SALE/g,'').trim();
        if(bool){
            if(parent.parentElement.querySelector('.sale_ticket.new'))return;
            el.innerText = el.innerText.replace('NUEVO','').trim();
            if(el.querySelector('.sale_ticket.new'))return;
            el.appendChild(template.label(thisClass, thisTxt));
        }
        if(!bool){
            if(parent.parentElement.querySelector('.sale_ticket.sale'))return;
            var a = el.innerText.toLowerCase().replace('sale','').trim();
            el.innerText = a.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + a.slice(1);
            // el.innerText = el.innerText.replace('SALE','').trim();
            if(el.querySelector('.sale_ticket.sale'))return;
            el.appendChild(template.label(thisClass, thisTxt));
        }
    }
};
(function(){
    if(!document.querySelector('.firstLevelMenu__desktop')) return;
    window.addEventListener('click', function(e){
        if(/(arrowToggle|downArrowToggle|upArrowToggle|hamburgerBtn|icon-container-active|title|icon|line)/.test(e.target.className)){
            tool.seekAndDestroy();
        }
    });    
})();

<script>_satellite["_runScript9"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var pageName=_satellite.getVar('page_pageType')?_satellite.getVar('page_pageType'):_satellite.getVar('page_pageName');
switch (pageName) {
	case 'product detail page':
		syteDataLayer = window.syteDataLayer || [];
		syteDataLayer.push({
			name: 'fe_page_view',
			tag: 'ecommerce',
			sku: _satellite.getVar('ecom_sku')
		});
		break;
	case 'basket':

    if(digitalData.ecom.productList.length!==0){
      syteDataLayer = window.syteDataLayer || [];
		syteDataLayer.push({
			name: 'checkout_start',
			tag: 'ecommerce',
			value: getTotal(),
			currency: 'COP',
			products: getProd()
		});
  
    }
		
		break;
	default:
		syteDataLayer = window.syteDataLayer || [];
		syteDataLayer.push({
			name: 'fe_page_view',
			tag: 'ecommerce'
		});

		break;
}


function getProd() {

	var prodsArr = []
	digitalData.ecom.productList.forEach(function (el) {
		var tempObj = {
			'sku': el.sku,
			'price': el.price,
			'quantity': el.quantity
		};
		prodsArr.push(tempObj);
	});
	return prodsArr;
}

function getTotal() {
	var total = 0;
	digitalData.ecom.productList.forEach(function (el) {
		total = el.price + total;
	})
	return total;
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript10"](function(event, target, Promise) {
var searchSelector = 'input[class*="SearchBar"]';
var resultAreaSelector = 'div[class*="SearchList-module_searchResults"]';
var sessionStorageName = 'typeaheadresult';

function handleEvent(el) {

    var sectionText;
    var section = el.closest('section');

    var greenResult;
    var pickedElementText = el.innerText;

    var searchTerm = document.querySelector(searchSelector);


    try {
        sectionText = section.querySelector('h6').innerText
    } catch (e) {
        sectionText = 'keyword';
        greenResult = 'en negro';
    }

    var options = section.querySelector('ul').childNodes;

    var index = getIndex(el, options);

    /**
     * When index is Not a Number, the result is inside green section
     */
    if (isNaN(index)) {
        options.forEach(function(e) {
            var ul = e.querySelector('ul');
            if (ul) {
                pickedElementText = ul.parentNode.querySelector('a').innerText;
                options = ul.childNodes;
                index = getIndex(el, options);
                greenResult = 'en verde';
            }
        });
    }
    sessionStorage.setItem(sessionStorageName,
        searchTerm.value + '|' + sectionText + '|' + pickedElementText + '|' + index + '/' + options.length + (greenResult ? '|' + greenResult : '')
    );
}

function getIndex(element, list) {
    var index;
    list.forEach(function(e, i) {
        if (e.querySelector('a').href == element.href) {
            index = i;
        }
    });
    return index + 1;
}


function execute() {
    try {
        var current = 0,
            tries = 10;
        var resultArea;

        var interval = setInterval(function() {

            resultArea = document.querySelector(resultAreaSelector);

            if (resultArea) {
                var links = resultArea.querySelectorAll('a');

                links.forEach(function(l) {
                    l.addEventListener('click', function() {
                        handleEvent(l);
                    });
                });
                clearInterval(interval);
            }


            if (tries < current) {
                clearInterval(interval);
            }

            current++;
        }, 500);
    } catch (ex) {}
}


document.addEventListener('click', function() {
    execute();
});

var inputBar = document.querySelector('#testId-SearchBar-Input');
if (inputBar) {
    inputBar.addEventListener('change', function() {
        execute();
    });
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript11"](function(event, target, Promise) {

        'j_sublinea': _satellite.getVar('recs_sublinea'),
        'j_clase': _satellite.getVar('recs_clase'),
        'j_subclase': _satellite.getVar('recs_subclase'),
        'marketplace': mktplaceBool,
        'sku':_satellite.getVar('ecom_sku'),
        'productId':_satellite.getVar('ecom_productId')
    };
}
if(/\/category\//.test(document.URL)){
    newObject = {
        'j_linea': _satellite.getVar('PLP_ecom_linea'),
        'j_sublinea': _satellite.getVar('PLP_ecom_sublinea')
    };
}

//define methods for interact with ui

var UI = (function() {
  function UI() {
    _classCallCheck(this, UI);
  }

  _createClass(UI, [
    {
      key: "findStyleTag",
      value: function findStyleTag(where, what) {
        var a = document.getElementsByTagName(where)[0].children;
        a = Array.from(a);
        var styleTags = a.filter(function(el) {
          return el.localName === what;
        });
        return styleTags[0];
      }
    },
    {
      key: "createTag",
      value: function createTag(name, content) {
        //return `<meta name="${name}" content="${content}">`
        var meta = document.createElement("meta");
        meta.name = name;
        meta.content = content;
        return meta;
      }
    }
  ]);

  return UI;
})();

//init function

function addMetas() {
  var ui = new UI();
  var firstStyle = ui.findStyleTag("head", "style");

  metaInfo.map(function(el) {
    var tags = ui.createTag(el.name, el.content);
    firstStyle.insertAdjacentElement("beforebegin", tags);
  });
}
addMetas();

  _createClass(Bakery, null, [{
    key: 'getCookieExpiresString',
    value: function getCookieExpiresString(hideTtl) {
      var now = new Date();
      var expireTime = new Date(now.getTime() + hideTtl);
      return 'expires=' + expireTime.toGMTString() + ';';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'getPathString',
    value: function getPathString(path) {
      return 'path=' + path + ';';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'bake',
    value: function bake(hideTtl) {

      document.cookie = 'smartbanner_exited=1; ' + (hideTtl ? Bakery.getCookieExpiresString(hideTtl) : '') + ' ' + (hidePath ? Bakery.getPathString(hidePath) : '');
    }
  }, {
    key: 'unbake',
    value: function unbake() {
      document.cookie = 'smartbanner_exited=; expires=Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT;';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'baked',
    get: function get() {
      var value = document.cookie.replace(/(?:(?:^|.*;\s*)smartbanner_exited\s*\=\s*([^;]*).*$)|^.*$/, '$1');
      return value === '1';
    }
  }]);

        return 'ios';
      } else if (/Android/i.test(window.navigator.userAgent)) {
        return 'android';

var _createClass = function () { function defineProperties(target, props) { for (var i = 0; i < props.length; i++) { var descriptor = props[i]; descriptor.enumerable = descriptor.enumerable || false; descriptor.configurable = true; if ("value" in descriptor) descriptor.writable = true; Object.defineProperty(target, descriptor.key, descriptor); } } return function (Constructor, protoProps, staticProps) { if (protoProps) defineProperties(Constructor.prototype, protoProps); if (staticProps) defineProperties(Constructor, staticProps); return Constructor; }; }();

function _classCallCheck(instance, Constructor) { if (!(instance instanceof Constructor)) { throw new TypeError("Cannot call a class as a function"); } }

function valid(name) {
  // TODO: validate against options dictionary
  return name.indexOf('smartbanner:') !== -1 && name.split(':')[1].length > 0;
}

function convertToCamelCase(name) {
  var parts = name.split('-');
  parts.map(function (part, index) {
    if (index > 0) {
      parts[index] = part.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + part.substring(1);
    }
  });
  return parts.join('');
}

var OptionParser = function () {
  function OptionParser() {
    _classCallCheck(this, OptionParser);
  }

  _createClass(OptionParser, [{
    key: 'parse',
    value: function parse() {
      var metas = document.getElementsByTagName('meta');
      var options = {};
      var optionName = null;
      Array.from(metas).forEach(function (meta) {
        var name = meta.getAttribute('name');
        var content = meta.getAttribute('content');
        if (name && content && valid(name) && content.length > 0) {
          optionName = name.split(':')[1];
          if (Array.from(optionName).includes('-')) {
            optionName = convertToCamelCase(optionName);
          }
          options[optionName] = content;
        }
      });
      return options;
    }
  }]);

  return OptionParser;
}();

exports.default = OptionParser;

var DEFAULT_PLATFORMS = 'android,ios';

var datas = {
  originalTop: 'data-smartbanner-original-top',
  originalMarginTop: 'data-smartbanner-original-margin-top'
};

function handleExitClick(event, self) {
  self.exit();
  event.preventDefault();
}

function handleJQueryMobilePageLoad(event) {
  if (!this.positioningDisabled) {
    setContentPosition(event.data.height);
  }
}

function addEventListeners(self) {
  var closeIcon = document.querySelector('.js_smartbanner__exit');
  closeIcon.addEventListener('click', function (event) {
    return handleExitClick(event, self);
  });
  if (_detector2.default.jQueryMobilePage()) {
    $(document).on('pagebeforeshow', self, handleJQueryMobilePageLoad);
  }
}

function removeEventListeners() {
  if (_detector2.default.jQueryMobilePage()) {
    $(document).off('pagebeforeshow', handleJQueryMobilePageLoad);
  }
}

function setContentPosition(value) {
  var wrappers = _detector2.default.wrapperElement();
  for (var i = 0, l = wrappers.length, wrapper; i < l; i++) {
    wrapper = wrappers[i];
    if (_detector2.default.jQueryMobilePage()) {
      if (wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalTop)) {
        continue;
      }
      var top = parseFloat(getComputedStyle(wrapper).top);
      wrapper.setAttribute(datas.originalTop, isNaN(top) ? 0 : top);
      wrapper.style.top = value + 'px';
    } else {
      if (wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalMarginTop)) {
        continue;
      }
      var margin = parseFloat(getComputedStyle(wrapper).marginTop);
      wrapper.setAttribute(datas.originalMarginTop, isNaN(margin) ? 0 : margin);
      //wrapper.style.marginTop = value + 'px';
    }
  }
}

function restoreContentPosition() {
  var wrappers = _detector2.default.wrapperElement();
  for (var i = 0, l = wrappers.length, wrapper; i < l; i++) {
    wrapper = wrappers[i];
    if (_detector2.default.jQueryMobilePage() && wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalTop)) {
      wrapper.style.top = wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalTop) + 'px';
    } else if (wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalMarginTop)) {
      wrapper.style.marginTop = wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalMarginTop) + 'px';
    }
  }
}

var SmartBanner = function () {
  function SmartBanner() {
    _classCallCheck(this, SmartBanner);

    var parser = new _optionparser2.default();
    this.options = parser.parse();
    this.platform = _detector2.default.platform();
  }

  // DEPRECATED. Will be removed.


  _createClass(SmartBanner, [{
    key: 'publish',
    value: function publish() {
      if (Object.keys(this.options).length === 0) {
        throw new Error('No options detected. Please consult documentation.');
      }

      if (_bakery2.default.baked) {
        return false;
      }

      // User Agent was explicetely excluded by defined excludeUserAgentRegex
      if (this.userAgentExcluded) {
        return false;
      }

      // User agent was neither included by platformEnabled,
      // nor by defined includeUserAgentRegex
      if (!(this.platformEnabled || this.userAgentIncluded)) {
        return false;
      }

      var siteWrapper = document.querySelector(".site-wrapper");
      var bannerDiv = document.createElement('div');
      siteWrapper.insertAdjacentElement('beforebegin', bannerDiv);
      //document.querySelector('body').appendChild(bannerDiv);
      bannerDiv.outerHTML = this.html;
      if (!this.positioningDisabled) {
        setContentPosition(this.height);
      }
      addEventListeners(this);
    }
  }, {
    key: 'exit',
    value: function exit() {
      removeEventListeners();
      if (!this.positioningDisabled) {
        restoreContentPosition();
      }
      var banner = document.querySelector('.js_smartbanner');
      document.querySelector('body').removeChild(banner);
      _bakery2.default.bake(this.hideTtl, this.hidePath);
    }
  }, {
    key: 'originalTop',
    get: function get() {
      var wrapper = _detector2.default.wrapperElement()[0];
      return parseFloat(wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalTop));
    }

    // DEPRECATED. Will be removed.

  }, {
    key: 'originalTopMargin',
    get: function get() {
      var wrapper = _detector2.default.wrapperElement()[0];
      return parseFloat(wrapper.getAttribute(datas.originalMarginTop));
    }
  }, {
    key: 'priceSuffix',
    get: function get() {
      if (this.platform === 'ios') {
        return this.options.priceSuffixApple;
      } else if (this.platform === 'android') {
        return this.options.priceSuffixGoogle;
      }
      return '';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'icon',
    get: function get() {
      if (this.platform === 'android') {
        return this.options.iconGoogle;
      } else {
        return this.options.iconApple;
      }
    }
  }, {
    key: 'buttonUrl',
    get: function get() {
      if (this.platform === 'android') {
        return this.options.buttonUrlGoogle;
      } else if (this.platform === 'ios') {
        return this.options.buttonUrlApple;
      }
      return '#';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'html',
    get: function get() {
      var modifier = !this.options.customDesignModifier ? this.platform : this.options.customDesignModifier;
      return '<div class="smartbanner smartbanner--' + modifier + ' js_smartbanner">\n      <a href="javascript:void();" class="smartbanner__exit js_smartbanner__exit"></a>\n      <div class="smartbanner__icon" style="background-image: url(' + this.icon + ');"></div>\n      <div class="smartbanner__info">\n        <div>\n          <div class="smartbanner__info__title">' + this.options.title + '</div>\n          <div class="smartbanner__info__author">' + this.options.author + '</div>\n </div>\n      </div>\n      <a href="' + this.buttonUrl + '" target="_blank" class="smartbanner__button"><span class="smartbanner__button__label">' + this.options.button + '</span></a>\n    </div>';
      //<div class="smartbanner__info__price">' + this.options.price + this.priceSuffix + '</div>\n 
    }
  }, {
    key: 'height',
    get: function get() {
      var height = document.querySelector('.js_smartbanner').offsetHeight;
      return height !== undefined ? height : 0;
    }
  }, {
    key: 'platformEnabled',
    get: function get() {
      var enabledPlatforms = this.options.enabledPlatforms || DEFAULT_PLATFORMS;
      return enabledPlatforms && enabledPlatforms.replace(/\s+/g, '').split(',').indexOf(this.platform) !== -1;
    }
  }, {
    key: 'positioningDisabled',
    get: function get() {
      return this.options.disablePositioning === 'true';
    }
  }, {
    key: 'userAgentExcluded',
    get: function get() {
      if (!this.options.excludeUserAgentRegex) {
        return false;
      }
      return _detector2.default.userAgentMatchesRegex(this.options.excludeUserAgentRegex);
    }
  }, {
    key: 'userAgentIncluded',
    get: function get() {
      if (!this.options.includeUserAgentRegex) {
        return false;
      }
      return _detector2.default.userAgentMatchesRegex(this.options.includeUserAgentRegex);
    }
  }, {
    key: 'hideTtl',
    get: function get() {
      return this.options.hideTtl ? parseInt(this.options.hideTtl) : false;
    }
  }]);

  console.log("connected");
  return SmartBanner;
}();


exports.default = SmartBanner;

},{"./bakery.js":1,"./detector.js":2,"./optionparser.js":4}]},{},[3]);

<script type="text/javascript">
;(function(p,l,o,w,i,n,g){if(!p[i]){p.GlobalSnowplowNamespace=p.GlobalSnowplowNamespace||[];

<!-- Decidata stops tracking --><script>_satellite["_runScript14"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function fixArr(arr) {
    if (typeof (arr) === "object" && arr[0] && arr[0].skuId) {
        return arr;
    }

    if (typeof (arr) === undefined) {
        return null;
    }
    var temporalArr = [];
    if (Array.isArray(arr)) {
        temporalArr = arr;
    }
    if (typeof (arr) === "string") {
        temporalArr = arr.split(",");
    }

    var fixedArray = []
    temporalArr.forEach(function(el) {
        fixedArray.push({
            "skuId": el
        });
    });
    return fixedArray;

}

function fetchProductUpdatedInfo(skuString, callback) {

    //XMLHttpRequest
    var skuObj = fixArr(skuString);
    if (skuObj) {
        var fetchItemDetailRequest = new XMLHttpRequest();
        var fetchItemDetailURL = "/s/browse/v1/fetchItemDetails/co?" + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify({
            "products": skuObj
        }));

        fetchItemDetailRequest.addEventListener('load', function(event) {

                var response = JSON.parse(this.responseText);
                if (response.success && response.success === true) {
                    var filteredProducts = response.products.map(function(el) {
                        if (el.product.published !== false && el.product.purchasable !== false) {

                            var tempEl = {};
                            tempEl.id = el.product.id;
                            tempEl.prices = el.product.prices;
                            tempEl.prices.forEach(function(el2) {
                                el2.price = el2.originalPrice||el2.formattedLowestPrice;
                                delete el2.originalPrice;
                                delete el2.label;
                                delete el2.isLoyalty;
                                delete el2.opportunidadUnica;
                                delete el2.symbol;

                            });
                            return tempEl;

                        }
                    });
                  if(callback){
                       callback(filteredProducts);
                  }else{
                    console.log(filteredProducts);
                  }


                }

                if (response.success && response.success === false && callback) {
                     callback(null);

                }
        });

        fetchItemDetailRequest.open("GET", fetchItemDetailURL, true);
        fetchItemDetailRequest.send();
    }
}

window.fetchProductUpdatedInfo=fetchProductUpdatedInfo;

/**
 * EXP-53
 * HomeTag

 * from session storage to local storage

/**
 * 
 * @param {Element} element anchor element
 * @returns {Boolean} true if out of domain
 */
function isOutOfDomain(element) {
    if (element && element.tagName === 'A') {
        var url = element.href;
        url = url.indexOf('?') != -1 ? url.substring(0, url.indexOf('?')) : url;
        if (/falabella.com/.test(url)) {
            return false;
        } else if (/mi-cuenta\/giftcards/.test(url)) {
            return true;
        }
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

var ui = {
    isSLP: function() {
        return true;
    },
    str: function str() {
        return 'T|x|x|x|x|x|x|x|x';

    },
    approvedTrackClick: function approvedTrackClick(menulink) {
        var isMenuLink = false;
        if (/(ThirdLevelItems|SecondLevelItems|ToggleThirdCategories|thirdLevelMenu)/.test(menulink.className) || menulink && menulink.parentElement && /secondLevelMenu__/.test(menulink.parentElement.className) || menulink.closest('[class*="thirdLevelMenu__mobile"]')) {
            isMenuLink = true;
        }
        if (!isMenuLink)
            return;
        var finalCondition = false;
        finalCondition = isMenuLink;
        return finalCondition;
    },
    firstLevelDescription: function() {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;
        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            var menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__"] li');
            menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
            var a = menuItemsArr.find(function(element, i) {
                if (/active/.test(element.className)) {
                    return element;
                }
            });
            return windowW ? document.querySelector('[class*="firstLevelMenu__title--active"]').textContent.trim() : a.textContent.trim();
        } else {
            return windowW ? document.querySelector("#mobile-item-".concat(ui.firstLevelPosition())).textContent.trim() : document.querySelector("#item-".concat(ui.firstLevelPosition())).textContent.trim();
        }
    },
    firstLevelPosition: function() {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024,
            index, menuItems;
        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            if (windowW) {
                index = false;
                menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__title"]');
                menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
                menuItemsArr.map(function(element, i) {
                    if (/--active/.test(element.className)) {
                        index = i;
                    }
                });
                return index;
            } else {
                index = false;
                menuItems = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu__"] li');
                menuItemsArr = [].slice.apply(menuItems);
                menuItemsArr.map(function(element, i) {
                    if (/active/.test(element.className)) {
                        index = i;
                    }
                });
                return index;
            }
        } else {
            index = false;
            var section = window.screen.width < 1024 ? document.querySelectorAll("section[class*='menuSection'] section") : document.querySelectorAll("section[class*='menuSection'] > div > section");
            section = Array.from(section);
            section.map(function(element, i) {
                if (/display/.test(element.className)) {
                    index = i;
                }
            });

            return index;
        }
    },
    secondLevelDescription: function(theParent) {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;

        if (ui.isSLP()) {
            if (windowW) {
                return (theParent.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]') || theParent.closest('ul[class=""]').querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')).querySelector('a').textContent.trim();
            } else {
                return theParent.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]').textContent.trim();
            }

        } else {
            if (windowW) {
                return theParent.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_detailsElementsSmallDevice"]') ? theParent.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_detailsElementsSmallDevice"]').querySelector('a,p').textContent.trim() : theParent.closest('[class*=ThirdLevelItems_activeMobileThirdLevel]').previousSibling.querySelector('a,p').textContent.trim()
            } else {
                return theParent.querySelector('[class*="SecondLevelItems_submenuTitle"]').textContent.trim();

            }
        }
    },
    order: function order(el, type) {
        var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024,
            thirdLevelContainer, thirdLevelLinkArr, clickedThirdLevel;
        var order = false;
        var menuLink = el;

        var columnOrder = function() {
            return windowW ? menuLink.closest("nav").querySelectorAll('[class*="firstLevelMenu"]') : menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenuContainer"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu__dekstop"]');
        };
        columnOrder = [].slice.apply(columnOrder());

        if (windowW && type === "column") {
            var newMenuLink = menuLink.closest("ul:not([class])");
            var newMenuLinkArr = [].slice.apply(newMenuLink.querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]'));
            return (newMenuLinkArr.indexOf(menuLink.closest('ul[class=""]').querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')) + 1);

        }
        //desktop
        if (!windowW && type === "column") {
            return (columnOrder.indexOf(menuLink.closest('ul[class*="secondLevelMenu"]')) + 1);
        }

        //mobile
        if (windowW && type === "row") {
            if (menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]')) {
                return 0;
            } else {
                thirdLevelContainer = menuLink.closest('[class*="thirdLevelMenu__mobile"]');
                thirdLevelLinkArr = [].slice.apply(thirdLevelContainer.querySelectorAll('li'));
                clickedThirdLevel = menuLink.closest('li');
                return thirdLevelLinkArr.indexOf(clickedThirdLevel) + 1;

            }
        }

        if (!windowW && type === "row") {

            if (menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title"]')) {
                return 0;
            } else {
                thirdLevelContainer = menuLink.closest('ul[class*="thirdLevelMenu"]');
                thirdLevelLinkArr = [].slice.apply(thirdLevelContainer.querySelectorAll('li'));
                clickedThirdLevel = menuLink.closest('li');
                return thirdLevelLinkArr.indexOf(clickedThirdLevel) + 1;

            }
        }
        var filterColum = function() {
            if (ui.isSLP()) {
                if (windowW) {
                    var a = columnOrder.find(function(el) {
                        if (el.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title--active"]')) {
                            return el.querySelector('[class*="secondLevelMenu__title--active"]');
                        }
                    });
                    return [].slice.apply(a.querySelectorAll('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"]'));
                } else {
                    return columnOrder;
                }
            } else {
                return columnOrder;
            }
        };
        filterColum().map(function(el, i) {
            var rgx = el.textContent;

            var title = function() {
                if (ui.isSLP()) {
                    return el.innerText.split("\n", 1)[0];
                } else {
                    return el.textContent.substr(0, secondLevelDescription.length);
                }
            };

            var theParent = function() {
                if (windowW) {
                    return linkTo;
                } else {
                    if (menuLink.className.indexOf("thirdLevelMenu--link") > -1 || menuLink.className.indexOf("ThirdLevelItems_submenuElementLi") > -1) {
                        return ui.isSLP() ? menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement : menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement
                    } else {
                        return menuLink.parentElement.parentElement;
                    }
                }
            };
            var secondLevelDescription = ui.secondLevelDescription(theParent());

            if (title() === secondLevelDescription) {

                if (rgx.indexOf(menuLink.textContent.trim()) > -1) {
                    var indexColumn = i;
                    var thisSlpTitle = ui.isSLP() ? /__title/.test(menuLink.className) : /_submenuTitle/.test(menuLink.className);
                    if (thisSlpTitle) {
                        if (menuLink.textContent === el.querySelector('[class*="_submenuTitle"]').textContent) {
                            switch (type) {
                                case "column":
                                    order = indexColumn;
                                    break;
                                case "row":
                                    order = /<\/a>/.test(menuLink.outerHTML) ? indexColumn = 0 : indexColumn + 1;
                                    break;
                                default:
                                    break;
                            }
                        }
                    } else {
                        var isSLPListElement = ui.isSLP() ? el.querySelectorAll('li') : el.querySelectorAll("[class*=ThirdLevelItems_listElements]");
                        // var thirdLink = windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=thirdLevelMenu') : isSLPListElement;
                        var thirdLink = function() {
                            if (ui.isSLP()) {
                                return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="secondLevelMenu__mobile"] [class*="secondLevelMenu__content"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=thirdLevelMenu') : isSLPListElement;
                            } else {
                                // return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="SecondLevelItems_displaySubMenuMobile"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=ThirdLevelItems_activeMobileThirdLevel] li') : isSLPListElement;
                                return windowW ? menuLink.closest('[class*="activeMobileThirdLevel"]').querySelectorAll('[class*=ThirdLevelItems]') : isSLPListElement;
                            }
                        };
                        thirdLink = [].slice.apply(thirdLink());
                        thirdLink.map(function(el, i) {
                            if (el.textContent.trim() === menuLink.textContent.trim()) {
                                switch (type) {
                                    case "column":
                                        order = indexColumn;
                                        break;
                                    case "row":
                                        order = ui.isSLP() ? i - 1 : i + 1;
                                        break;
                                    default:
                                        break;
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    }
                }
            }
        });
        return order;
    }
};

function execute() {

    var firstLevelDescription, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition,
        columnOrder, rowOrder, firstLevelCollection, linksCollection, columnCollection;

    var windowW = window.screen.width < 1024;
    var topLevelMenu = document.querySelector('[class*="hamburgerBtn"]') ? document.querySelectorAll('[class*="hamburgerBtn"]') : document.querySelectorAll('.fb-masthead__new-hamburger-menu [class*="_firstCategories"],[class*="CategoryMenuButton-module_menu-toggle-button"]');
    //var validateServer = digitalData.page.serverName;
    if (topLevelMenu.length === 0)
        return;
    document.addEventListener('click', function(event) {
        try {
            var menuLink = windowW ? event.target : event.target.closest('a');
            var anchorLink = menuLink ? menuLink.closest('a') || menuLink.querySelector('a') : null;

            if (menuLink && ui.approvedTrackClick(menuLink)) {
                firstLevelPosition = ui.firstLevelPosition() + 1;
                firstLevelDescription = ui.firstLevelDescription();
                var linkTo = event.target || event.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.querySelector('[class*="submenuTitleToggleActive"]');
                var theParent = function() {
                    if (windowW) {
                        return linkTo;
                    } else {
                        if (menuLink.className.indexOf("thirdLevelMenu--link") > -1 || menuLink.className.indexOf("ThirdLevelItems_submenuElementLi") > -1) {
                            return ui.isSLP() ? menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement : menuLink.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement
                        } else {
                            return menuLink.parentElement.parentElement;
                        }
                    }
                };
                secondLevelDescription = ui.secondLevelDescription(theParent());
                thirdLevelDescription = menuLink.textContent.trim() !== "" && menuLink.textContent.trim() !== "arrow" ? menuLink.textContent.trim() : secondLevelDescription;

                columnOrder = ui.order(menuLink, 'column');
                rowOrder = ui.order(menuLink, 'row') === -1 ? 0 : ui.order(menuLink, 'row');

                if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                    localStorage.setItem('hometag', ui.str());
                    //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));

                }

                localStorage.setItem('topLevelMenuCoords', firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder);

            }
            if (/img_banner/.test(event.target.className)) {
                firstLevelPosition = ui.firstLevelPosition();
                var topCategory = event.target.parentElement.parentElement.parentElement.closest('[class*="submenuStage"]').querySelector('[class*="FirstLevelItems_menuElementsHover"]').textContent;
                var ImgName = event.target.src.match(/([^\/]+)\?|([^\/]+)\.gif|([^\/]+)\.jpg|([^\/]+)\.jpeg/)[0].replace('?', '');
                if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                    localStorage.setItem('hometag', ui.str());
                }
                localStorage.setItem('topLevelMenuCoords', topCategory + '|' + 'B1' + '|' + ImgName + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + '50' + '|' + '1');
            }
            if (event.target.closest('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_category-content-container"],[class*="CategoryMenuMobile-module_mobile-menu-container"]')) {
                if (window.screen.width < 1024) {
                    //dosomething
                    if (event.target.closest('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]') || event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]') && event.target.localName !== "svg" && !/CategoryMenuButton-module_hamburger/i.test(event.target.className)) {
                        columnCollection = [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[data-testid="first-level-category"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]'));
                        linksCollection = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]').querySelectorAll('[class*="MenuBody-module_leaf-category-item"]')) : [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-2"]').parentElement.parentElement.querySelectorAll('[class*="MenuBody-module_leaf-category-item"]'));
                        firstLevelCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="AccordionContent-module_level-button-1"]'));

                        firstLevelPosition = firstLevelCollection.indexOf(document.querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-1][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]')) + 1;
                        firstLevelDescription = document.querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-1][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]').innerText;
                        columnOrder = columnCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="first-level-category"]').querySelector('[class*=AccordionContent-module_level-button-2][class*=AccordionContent-module_active]'));
                        if (columnCollection[columnOrder] === undefined) {
                            return;
                        }

                        secondLevelDescription = columnCollection[columnOrder].innerText;
                        thirdLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]').innerText : columnCollection[columnOrder].innerText;
                        rowOrder = !event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category"]') ? 0 : linksCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category"]')) + 1;
                        if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                            localStorage.setItem('hometag', ui.str());
                            //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));

                        }
                        localStorage.setItem('topLevelMenuCoords', firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder);

                    }
                } else {
                    if (event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') || ('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]')) {
                        columnCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[class*="SubCategories-module_tab-container"] ul'));
                        linksCollection = [].slice.apply(event.target.closest('ul').querySelectorAll('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]'));
                        firstLevelCollection = [].slice.apply(document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="desktop-menu-category-button"]'))

                        firstLevelPosition = firstLevelCollection.indexOf(document.querySelector('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_active"]')) + 1;
                        firstLevelDescription = document.querySelector('[class*="CategoryMenuDesktop-module_active"] span').innerText;
                        columnOrder = columnCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('ul'));
                        secondLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText : event.target.closest('ul').querySelector('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText;
                        thirdLevelDescription = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]').innerText : event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]').innerText;
                        rowOrder = event.target.closest('[data-testid="second-level-category-link"]') ? 0 : linksCollection.indexOf(event.target.closest('[data-testid="third-level-category-link"]')) + 1;
                        if (_satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'home' || _satellite.getVar('page_pageName') === 'falabella home') {
                            localStorage.setItem('hometag', ui.str());
                            //sessionStorage.setItem('cyberString', ui.str(firstLevelDescription, firstLevelPosition, secondLevelDescription, thirdLevelDescription, columnOrder, rowOrder));

                        }
                        localStorage.setItem('topLevelMenuCoords', firstLevelDescription + '|' + secondLevelDescription + '|' + thirdLevelDescription + '|' + firstLevelPosition + '|' + columnOrder + '|' + rowOrder);

                    }

                }
            }
            if (menuLink && windowW && !ui.approvedTrackClick(menuLink) && (menuLink.closest('li[class*="MenuUtils"]') || menuLink.querySelector('li[class*="MenuUtils"]'))) {

                var listElement = menuLink.closest('li[class*="MenuUtils"]') || menuLink.querySelector('li[class*="MenuUtils"]');
                var menuItems = Array.from(listElement.closest('ul').querySelectorAll('li[class*="MenuUtils"]'));
                var menuDescription = listElement.innerText.trim().replace(/\r?\n|\r/g, ' ');
                menuDescription = menuDescription.startsWith('Tienes') ? 'Mis CMR puntos' : menuDescription;

                localStorage.setItem('topLevelMenuCoords', menuDescription + '|' + menuDescription + '|' + menuDescription + '|' + 'H' + (menuItems.indexOf(listElement) + 1) + '|0|0');
            }

            if (_satellite && localStorage.getItem('topLevelMenuCoords') && isOutOfDomain(anchorLink)) {
                _satellite.track('OOD_CALL');
            }
        } catch (ex) {}
    });
}

execute();

 <script>_satellite["_runScript16"](function(event, target, Promise) {
if(_satellite.getVar('s_referrer')){
    s.referrer=_satellite.getVar('s_referrer');
    }
    
    //FIX PARA CAMBIAR LINK DE FOOTER EN INTERNA 3 DE AGOSTO DE 2018
    
    var linkWebtracking = document.querySelector('.fb-footer-content__links > li:nth-child(2) > a');
    if(linkWebtracking){
