</style><script>_satellite["_runScript20"](function(event, target, Promise) {
function addMarkup() {
    var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
    iframe.setAttribute('marginwidth', 0);
    iframe.setAttribute('marginheight', 0);
    iframe.setAttribute('scrolling', 'no');
    iframe.setAttribute('frameborder', 0);
    iframe.setAttribute('class', 'chat-widget-panel');

    var aside = document.createElement('aside');
    aside.appendChild(iframe);
    aside.setAttribute('id', 'chat-widget');
    aside.setAttribute('class', 'chat-widget');
    document.body.appendChild(aside);
}

//Add Message listener to hide the chatbot iframe

function handleAmandaClick(amandaState, event) {
    var src = document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').getAttribute('src');
    if (!src && window.amandaloading !== 'loading') {
        window.amandaloading = 'loading';
        if (_satellite.getVar('isInternalNetwork')) {
            document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').setAttribute('src', 'https://as-ia-colombia-prd-web.azurewebsites.net');
        } else {
            //https://as-ia-colombia-stg-web.azurewebsites.net/chat.html
            //https://as-ia-colombia-prd-web.azurewebsites.net
            document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').setAttribute('src', 'https://as-ia-colombia-prd-web.azurewebsites.net');

        }

        document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').addEventListener('load', function () {
            document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').style.display = "block";
            document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').setAttribute('style', 'position:static;');
            document.querySelector('aside#chat-widget').setAttribute('style', 'z-index:1900;');
            if (document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container')) {
                document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container').style.display = 'none';
            }
            if (window.innerWidth < 1023) {
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.height = "100%"
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.width = "100%"
            }
            //postMessage to amanda

            this.contentWindow.postMessage({
                cookie: _satellite.readCookie('JSESSIONID')
            }, '*');

            var _this = this;
            var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
            xhr.open('GET', 'https://www.falabella.com.co/rest/model/atg/userprofiling/ProfileActor/fetchSessionInfo');
            xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
            xhr.onload = function () {
                if (xhr.status === 200) {
                    profileSuccessInfoCall(JSON.parse(xhr.responseText), _this);
                }
            };
            xhr.send();
            window.amandaloading = 'loaded';
        })
    } else if (window.amandaloading === 'loaded') {
        document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').style.display = "block";

        document.querySelector('aside#chat-widget').setAttribute('style', 'z-index:1900;')
        if (document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container')) {
            document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container').style.display = 'none';
        }
        if (window.innerWidth < 1023) {
            if (event && event.data && event.data.amanda === 'close') {
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.height = "";
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.width = "";
            } else {
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.height = "100%";
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.width = "100%";
            }
        }
    }
}

function profileSuccessInfoCall(session, amanda) {
    var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();
    xhr.open('GET', 'https://www.falabella.com.co/rest/model/atg/userprofiling/ProfileActor/profile-success');
    xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');
    xhr.onload = function () {
        if (xhr.status === 200) {
            amanda.contentWindow.postMessage({
                session_info: session
                /*,
                                       profile_success: data*/
            }, '*');
        }
    };
    xhr.send();
}

//Desktop code

function insertAmandaDesktop() {
    window.addEventListener('message', function (e) {
        if (e.data && e.data.amanda === 'close') {
            document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').style.display = "none";
            window.amandaState = handleAmandaClick(window.amandaState, e);
        }
    });
    //Use the selectors for the new icon that comes with the page
    if (document.querySelector('.fb-masthead-chatbot.fb-masthead-item--chatbot')) {
        document.querySelector('.fb-masthead-chatbot.fb-masthead-item--chatbot').addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            window.amandaState = handleAmandaClick(window.amandaState, e);
        });
    }

    window.addEventListener('message', function (e) {
        if (e.data && e.data.amanda === 'close') {
            if (document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container')) {
                document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container').style.display = '';
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget-panel').style.display = "none";
            }
        }
    });
}

function insertAmandaMobile(condition) {
    if (condition && document.querySelector('#item-necesitasayuda')) {

        document.querySelector('#item-necesitasayuda').addEventListener('click', function (e) {
            document.body.className += ' shadow-inactive';
            window.amandaState = handleAmandaClick(window.amandaState, e);
            if (document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container')) {
                document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container').style.display = 'none';
            }
            document.querySelector('#header').click();
        });
        window.addEventListener('message', function (e) {
            if (e.data && e.data.amanda === 'close') {
                document.querySelector('aside#chat-widget').removeAttribute('style');
                document.body.className = document.body.className.replace(/\s?shadow-inactive/, '');
            }
        });

    } else {
        var mobileChatbotElement = document.querySelector('#item-necesitasayuda');
        if (mobileChatbotElement) {
            mobileChatbotElement.parentNode.removeChild(mobileChatbotElement);
        }
    }

}

function insertAmandaBubble() {
    var amandaBubbleContainer = document.createElement('div');
    amandaBubbleContainer.setAttribute('id', 'amanda-bubble-container');
    amandaBubbleContainer.className = 'chat-widget-button';

    amandaBubbleContainer.addEventListener('click', function (e) {
        window.amandaState = handleAmandaClick(window.amandaState, e);
    });

    document.querySelector('aside#chat-widget').appendChild(amandaBubbleContainer);

    window.addEventListener('message', function (e) {
        if (e.data && e.data.amanda === 'close') {
            if (document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container')) {
                document.querySelector('#amanda-bubble-container').style.display = '';
            }
            if (window.innerWidth < 1023) {
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.height = '100%';
                document.querySelector('.chat-widget').style.width = '100%';
            }
        }
    });

}

if (typeof window.insertAmandaDesktop !== 'undefined') {
    addMarkup();
    if (window.digitalData && digitalData.page && digitalData.page.pageName === 'home' || document.URL.replace(/\?.*/, '') === "https://www.falabella.com.co/falabella-co/") {
        window.digitalData.page = {
            pageName: "home"
        }
        insertAmandaBubble();
    }
    insertAmandaMobile(true);
    insertAmandaDesktop();
} else {
    window.addAmandaMarkup = addMarkup;
    window.insertAmandaBubble = insertAmandaBubble;
    window.insertAmandaMobile = insertAmandaMobile;
    window.insertAmandaDesktop = insertAmandaDesktop;
}
});</script><script>_satellite["_runScript21"](function(event, target, Promise) {

          document.querySelector('.fb-masthead__primary-links__item--chatbot').remove();
